-- | Parsers and formatters for the SVMlight input file format
--   
@package svm-light-utils
@version 0.1.0.0


-- | This package provides a variety of utilities for parsing and producing
--   SVMlight input files.
module Math.SVM.SVMLight.Utils
newtype Qid
Qid :: Int -> Qid

-- | A feature identifier
newtype FeatureIdx
FIdx :: Int -> FeatureIdx

-- | A sample point (e.g. a line of an SVMlight input file).
data Point
Point :: Int -> Maybe Qid -> Map FeatureIdx Double -> Maybe ByteString -> Point
pLabel :: Point -> Int
pQid :: Point -> Maybe Qid
pFeatures :: Point -> Map FeatureIdx Double
pComment :: Point -> Maybe ByteString

-- | Parse a sample point
point :: Parser Point
featureIdx :: Parser FeatureIdx

-- | A <tt>Builder</tt> containing the given <tt>Point</tt>s
renderPoints :: [Point] -> Builder

-- | A <tt>Builder</tt> containing the given <tt>Point</tt>
renderPoint :: Point -> Builder
instance Show Qid
instance Ord Qid
instance Eq Qid
instance Show FeatureIdx
instance Ord FeatureIdx
instance Eq FeatureIdx
instance Show Point
instance Ord Point
instance Eq Point
